title: Turtle Bay HuaHin eco luxeTurt Villa in Lotus Bay
description:
Turtle Eco Luxe Villa - Rare find OMG & 2024 Best Design
A unique Turtle Shape villa located in lotus pond surrounding by nature Khao Tao Valley and Sai Noi beach. Private one bed room studio villa comprising spacious bathroom and outdoor waterside living deck.
Unique design cafe and restaurant you can order breakfast lunch and dinner
-2024 Featured in Room Magazine Book 2024 Best designs

-Wining Global Design Award
We have 3 Turtle Villas please see my listing if you require more room
The space
Turtle Bay Villa is meant for those travelers who are looking to spend a little down time on serene natural lotus pond while staying true to their sustainable lifestyles.


The idyllic floating Turtle Shape villa cover 25 SQM for bedroom and large bathroom. This compound also has common areas for our guest such as guest living room, café, botanic garden. The room includes several added amenities just like luxury resort with your own amenity.

Guests of the Turtle Bay will enjoy food and drinks at Turtle Bay Café and Restaurant
Check out my other 2 Turtle villas
Guest access
Key points
- locating in the middle of natural lotus pond
- in the middle of Khao Tao Valley
- 3 mins walk to Sai Noi Beach
- next to Khao Tao Reservoir (5 sec walk)
- 5 mins walk to Kha Tao Fishing Village
extraInfo:
Other things to note
Rare Eco Luxe Villa by SEA Harmony Eco House. This is an guesthouse with essential services
- cleaning room every 3 days
- self-service and self-tour (optional service can be discussed with us)
- discount and deal on food and bervage at our restaurant

title: The GOAT Barnyard - Lakeside
description:
About this space
Enjoy the best view of Laguna Lake from Pililla, Rizal.

A goat farm with facilites for our confirmed beloved family guests and friends to enjoy. The place is great for team building, corporate events, family gatherings, weddings, birthdays, or just simply a serene staycation for small and big groups.
The space
Our place is not a resort but rather a farm house stay where you will feel close to nature and will experience tranquility and harmony while bonding with your friends and love ones.

It’s a home to some of our farm animals like goats, sheeps, chickens, birds, so please expect from time to time that there will be a certain smell (but not a bad smell), depending on the directions of the wind.
extraInfo:
Other things to note
We send a g**gle form to our confirmed guests to help us understand our guest’s needs during their stay. It is important to fill out the said form, otherwise, the default airbnb configuration and inclusion shall apply.

Other charges would apply depending on your requests..

Videoke is charged at 800 pesos for overnight but subject to terms and conditions of use.

Extra person is charged at 1,200 pesos per person for more than 24 pax.

Pet fee is 500 pesos per pet
Bonfire is 350 pesos per bundle of wood

Garden Dinner Table Setup is charged at 2,000 pesos inclusuon of dishwashing services that guests will use from the dinner setup.

Please bring towels, soap, shampoo, and other personal effects. Bring dishwashing liquid and sponge if you will have to wash utensils and dinnerwares or if you’ll use the items we have in the kitchen bar. For sanitary purposes and prevention of illnesses, each group of guests must have their own sponge.

We have a Terms and Conditions o

title: Ha Long Lily Homestay - Luxury Room 201
description:
About this place
Halong Lily Homestay is a perfect choice with someone who want to relax and love to feel the nature, the people and the culture in Halong city. With the villa architecture and many green trees, beautiful flowers, some lovely birds in the large garden by the beautiful Halong bay which is always full of sunshine and wind, all of your stress will disappear and you will have the wonderful time in our homestay.
The space
Firstly, Halong Lily is located in Halong Bay side, only 50m to the most beautiful seaside road of Vietnam, and 900m to the Hon Gai Beach. eventhought you could view directly to the bay from our homestay in 50m, so it is easy to blend in the fresh air and dreamlike sightseeing of Halong Bay.
Moreover, Halong Lily homestay has a large garden which has many flowers, trees, so you can enjoy the fresh air, natural light, sea wind and relaxing space
Besides, Ha long Lily homestay is situated in the cultural center of Halong city, near many famous constructions and the big shopping centres/super market of the city.
Luxury Room 201 is about more than 40 meter square, have eight windows and two balconies, full of natural light and view Halong Bay directly. It has private bathroom (with bathtub).
extraInfo:
Guest access
Guests will have their private bedrooms which are large, airy and with many windows and balconys. From the bedrooms, you can get the great view to the bay and to the lovely street around our homestay. Every room have a big double bed, an air conditioner, a cabinet, and it is primarily set up for guest. Beside the private room, you can use all other different place in our homestay: The common room in which you can watch Tv, listen music and read book, etc; The dinning room and the kitchen (you can cook by yourself or we can sevre local food for you); you can get a babercue in the yard of the lovely garden or drink something on the terrace while looking at the sea. The space of Halong Lily Homestay will make you feel comfortable.
During your stay
Backup services are available 24/24 hours. We can communicate in English fluently and we can give you necessary information about local area. We also have driving service if you need.

title: 2-BR KG House w/garden view (near Erawan Falls)
description:
About this space
Welcome to Riva KG house, where you can enjoy the stunning mountain and river views!You'll be closer to nature and able to escape the chaos of the city.

Our place is located in Kanchanaburi, about a 3-hour drive from Bangkok. We’re about 55 kilometers away from the city and 600 meters away from the main road which makes our place very quiet and private!

We offer free kayak, Stand Up Paddle board, and bicycle rentals for all guests staying at KG House.
The space
The house is a perfect size for 4 people. Comprised of 2 bedrooms with 2 private bathrooms.
In each bedroom: 1 Queen bed/ Pillows & Blanket/ TV/ Mini refrigerator/ Air conditioner
In each bathroom: Water heater/ Hair dryer/ Towels/ Shower gel/ Shampoo /Shower cap/ Cotton buds/ Dental kit
Terrace: 1 outdoor dining table with 4 chairs
Small kitchen: Gas stove/ Refrigerator/ Microwave/ Sink/ Dish ware
Guest access
KG house is an approximately 4,800 square meter large. You can walk around and explore the beautiful mountain and river views.

There are also rafts on the river that you can access anytime. Sitting and relaxing on the rafts and kayaking and stand up paddle boarding on the river are a must during your stay here.

We have a large dining terrace (like common area) where you can have our complimentary breakfast from 7 am to 10 am and enjoy sitting here anytime you want.
extraInfo:
Other things to note
- Free kayaking!
- Free bicycle rental!
- Free Stand-Up Paddle board rental!
- Fishing is allowed at our property and free of charge. Renting fishing poles from us, 100 THB/day/pole (not including baits).
- BBQ Charcoal Grill for rent with a fee of 150 THB/set
- Private river cruise (1-4 people) 30 minutes for 1,200 THB and 1 hour for 2,000 THB

If this listing is unavailable, please check out my other Airbnb listings on my Airbnb profile page or contact me directly.

Discounts for guests with long-term stays (7 days or more).

title: Ensuite 1BR w/Breakfast, Walk to TrangAn Boat Tour
description:
About this place
Trang An Freedom Hood is located in the core of Trang An World Heritage, Ninh Binh, Viet Nam and run by a local family; It's lovely and great for single travelers, couples, groups, families; Staff friendly, nature, clean and modern Hostel.
The Triple Room with Mountain View (Triple Room) has 1 queen size bed (1.6mx2.0m) and 1 single bed ( 1.2mx2.0m), private bathroom with shower, air conditioner, tea table and other necessary emenities,...
The space
Trang An Freedom Hood is 500m from the World Heritage Boat trip. Surrounded by spectacular scenery such as limestone system, natural lake, green field of trees...

title: ULuwatu room
description:
About this space
Casauary is a sanctuary for those seeking respite from the chaos of modern life. Located in the picturesque landscapes of Talisay in a 1.3 hectar land, overlooking Taal Volcano, Casauary offers a peaceful and rejuvenating escape, only 15mins away from Tagaytay & 1.5hours from Manila

Comes with:
• Nutritious, locally sourced dinner
• Simple breakfast (silog)
• Toiletries except toothbrush and toothpaste

Please note that we are still in the development process so please be nice ✨
The space
Surrounded by lush greeneries, Casauary is perfect for those seeking respite.

The place is made for two, but if you don’t mind squeezing in the tiny house, you can add another guest with an extra fee.

Hot tub is subject to availability

While the main house doesn't have a kitchen, our dedicated farm caretaker provides complimentary dinners and breakfasts prepared with fresh farm ingredients and local food. Enjoy peaceful surroundings, farm-to-table meals, and a memorable rural retreat.

Bed:
~ King-Sized Bed on the loft
extraInfo:
Guest access
Roam around our 1.3 hectar land (still in development stages)
Other things to note
No WIFI yet, but there is good data signal

title: Private Double Bungalow - Sapa Jungle Homestay S1
description:
About this space
In the center of Sapa, but it is not noisy. Our home is in the hill. From the main road, you go up to homestay about 80 meters. Come to Jungle, your first impression will be a descent between Po-mu trees. Bungalows which are designed completely by wood, are arrounding trees and specific flowers in Sapa.
In Jungle, you can drink natural teas, real coffee and local beer. When you stay here, you can live with natural things.
A place to be just being yourself and enjoy every moment here!
The space
It is far from bus station about 500 meters, the lake about 200 meters, the church about 900 meters, and surrounding convenience shop and supermarket!
extraInfo:
Guest access
We have open kitchen. It is convenient for you to make your breakfast, tea or coffee by yourself.
We love listening to music, sharing stories and connecting from soul to soul.
Dinner is time to chill out!
In dinner, we often cook together. If you would like, you can join with us. We can teach you how to cook Vietnamese food and you teach us how to cook your country’s food! It is so interesting, right?
Sitting around fireplace, while listening to music, we chat, share our stories!
In addition, we will be happy to assist you any additional needs you can need. This includes:
- Transportations from Hanoi to Sapa.
- Motorbike or bicycle rental
- Booking Tours
- Local Sim Card
- Laundry Service
- Restaurant Recommendations and directions
Other things to note
So feel free to enjoy here.
We can help you arrange transportation and make plan for you if you need!

title: Luxurious 6 Bedroom Mansion Close To Beach! (CAS)
description:
About this space
Escape to paradise and indulge in the ultimate holiday experience at our stunning 6-bedroom, 5-bathroom mansion located just 250 meters from the pristine beaches of Cha Am. Perfect for families and groups seeking lavish comfort and relaxation, this exquisite estate offers a wealth of amenities to make your stay truly unforgettable.
The space
Property Highlights:

Spacious Accommodation: With 6 beautifully appointed bedrooms, our mansion provides ample space for up to 14 guests.

Luxurious Bathrooms: Enjoy the convenience of 5 modern bathrooms, meticulously designed to offer comfort and style.

Family-Friendly: This estate is tailored for families, ensuring a safe and enjoyable environment for kids with plenty of entertainment options and a secure setting.

Expansive Garden: Revel in the beauty of our vast, lush garden, perfect for outdoor games, leisurely strolls, or simply unwinding amidst nature's tranquility.

Large Pool: Take a dip in the generously sized pool, ideal for refreshing swims or soaking up the Thai sun on comfortable loungers.

Beach Proximity: A mere 250 meters from the glistening shores of Cha Am Beach, our location offers easy access to sun-soaked sands and crystal-clear waters.

Maid Service: Your comfort is our priority! Benefit from our dedicated maid service available Monday through Saturday from 8 AM to 5 PM, ensuring a pristine and organized environment throughout your stay.

Location: Nestled in the serene surroundings of Cha Am, you'll find yourself in a tranquil oasis, yet conveniently close to local attractions, dining, and entertainment options.

Escape the ordinary and embrace the extraordinary! Contact us today to reserve your stay at our lavish Cha Am mansion for an unforgettable holiday retreat.

Option for extra beds, food delivery, massage and car or scooter rental are available through our service team every day at an additional charge. Our service team also provide bookings for local attractions and tours.

Pers
extraInfo:
Other things to note
The rental price includes electricity for 600 baht pr. night. Usage over will be charged at 6 baht pr. unit extra.

Electric meeter will be read at check in and check out. In average, a group for this size villa uses about 600 baht per night depending mostly on Aircondition usage.

Energy saving is for the sake of our world :)

Come and enjoy Hua Hin with us today !

Guest access
Entire Villa

title: Veluvana Bali - Owl Bamboo House
description:
About this space
Veluvana is a unique bamboo house with a wonderful view of Sidemen Valley, a genuine tropical landscape with Mount Agung peak on its back. This getaway spot is a great place to bring into reality the dream adventure of the true wanderer. We invite you to feel the magnificent vibes of the entire house to escape the life that is full of drama into a journey with ultimate joy.
The space
The bamboo house is located at the main tourist district of Sidemen, a small town with a magnificent landscape in the southern flank of Mount Agung. Sidemen is not a touristy area, it is about a 90-minute drive from Bali Airport and a 45-minute drive from Ubud. Besides the beautiful scenery and the indigenous culture Sidemen also surrounded by a lot of famous tourist destinations in Bali. Some of them include; Lempuyang Temple (The Gateway to Heaven), Besakih (The Mother Temple of Bali), Tirta Gangga Royal Water Palace, Telaga Waja River for Rafting, Amed Diving Spot, and Bias Putih the Virgin Beach.

Upon arrival at Veluvana bamboo house, you will find the upper ground parking area with a small gazebo on the west side of the entrance and a small front office building in the north-east edge. Take your time in the upper ground to enjoy the welcome drink served by our doorman while resting from a long journey through the wavy road of East Bali.

Once you finish your drink, the declining stairs down to the north edge of the upper ground will lead you to the bamboo house. You will not see the building until you reach the lower ground as it is secluded behind the bamboo wall and vegetation. At the lower ground, you will notice a small fish pond to be your silent neighbor during your stay. Spin the leaf door and follow the stone path to head into the ground level of the bamboo house.
All part of the building is fully designed for guest enjoyment. Sit back the bamboo couch to watch the painting-like scenery right from the ground level porch. On the left side of the house is a
extraInfo:
Other things to note
BEFORE YOU BOOK, PLEASE READ A FEW DETAILS FOR YOUR CONSIDERATION:

1. The Construction
The construction and furniture are mostly made of locally-sourced bamboo that covered with rice straw roofs. The building is designed and built by local bamboo artisans with serious consideration to the strength of the entire part of the construction and furniture. The lower level floor is a half meter from the ground with a higher edge on the north porch; please take care of your step while playing on this site. The upper level is 2.5 meters from the ground with stairs that are considered easy to climb; watch your head and hold the railing for your safety.

2. Water, Electricity, and Wi-Fi
The water you use in this house is supplied by the regional water company that distributes fresh water sourced from Mount Agung aquifer. Although the water is fresh, it is not ready to drink water, so please drink only water that is served in the bottle and ask the doormen to refill if it run
